skillTree.localised_description: Pugnacious and stubborn, the war beasts that pull these ramshackle chariots are grotesque combinations of great boar and mighty ram.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: Those strong enough to tame the powerful, unruly Razorgors can harness them to chariots.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.
Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Spreads like fire!

effects.description:

	(enemy armies in province)
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
Item defiled through dark rituals deep within the forests.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Sometimes it's possible to bend time.

skillTree.localised_description: Drain the power of your enemies and crush them.

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.
With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

skillTree.localised_description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

skillTree.localised_description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawned unit fights in this battle only
Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
True experience is born only on the battlefield.

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.
More than mere bloodlust, this one is filled with the primal, Ruinous rage of the Lord of Battle.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one has something of the compost heap about them…
Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Minotaur units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Blessed by the Dark Gods to never feel pain.
His scent is strong even amongst the herd.
Ungors obey!

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

Melee and missile weapon damage: +10% for Ungor units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Herds crumble but he stands.
Wild as a warhound, he never sleeps.

effects.description:

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always watching and stalking his pray!
